meanings.definition: The process of removing toxins from the body.
meanings.sent1: Detoxing helps the body get rid of harmful substances.
meanings.sent2: She felt better after detoxing her body from toxins.
meanings.sent3: After a weekend of unhealthy eating, she decided to start detoxing.
meanings.sent4: Detoxing is like giving your body a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of detoxing include increased energy and clearer skin.

meanings.definition: The act of abstaining from or ridding the body of toxic or unhealthy substances.
meanings.sent2: He committed to detoxing his body from unhealthy foods.
meanings.sent3: She joked that detoxing was her way of saying no to junk food.
meanings.sent4: Detoxing is like hitting the reset button on your health.
meanings.sent5: The importance of detoxing lies in maintaining a clean system.

meanings.definition: The act of undergoing a detoxification program.
meanings.sent1: She signed up for a week-long detoxing program.
meanings.sent2: Detoxing at the spa was a rejuvenating experience.
meanings.sent3: His friends teased him about going on a detoxing retreat.
meanings.sent4: Detoxing programs can help kickstart a healthier lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The results of a successful detoxing program are worth the effort.
